title: Dear Riot, I have a confession...
body:
Hello everyone. I have had this on my mind for **some time** now and I need to let it out. I am a scripter and have been for a while now. I got this account to silver through hacks alone as I am not a decent player. I even tried to sell this account but backed out and kept the money anyway. I KNOW! I KNOW! its terrible...This is a serious post too so Riot please take the necessary actions upon my accounts status...I am ready to accept the consequences. I am very sorry to the community for breaking the terms of service and the summoners code. I feel awful and a disciplinary action on my account would certainly set things right for me.

-Sam C (RARESTMAGENA)

replies.body:
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/3b/3b75813af2350e14a3403e46e8539c3cb2f8d44e36b0a0ff450203ef80b42b2c.jpg

If you want to "perma-ban" yourself, head over to Riot support and ask for your account to be deleted. They have a bunch on instructions for account deletion on their [site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784-Account-Deletion-FAQ#h2q4).

If you want to do something good with your account, then tell Riot that you scripted in your ticket. Give them the exact scripts used and when. That way they can use that information to improve the detection system and benefit all of us.

Thanks for being honest at least :D
